'development environment to write and run code in Python scripts and Jupyter'
'noteooks.'
'Create a compute instance to use this development environment for the rest of the'
'tutorials and quickstarts.'
"1. If you didn't just create a workspace in the previous section, sign in to Azure"
'Machine Learning studio 2 now, and select your workspace.'
'2. On the left side, select Compute.'
